name: Content Strategy & Copywriting
description: Develop content strategy and create marketing copy across channels. Includes blog posts, social media, landing pages, and ad copy. Balances brand consistency with channel-specific optimization.

painPoints: Aligning with SEO and business goals

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude generates strategic, differentiated content ideas
aiProcess.expectedOutput: 10-15 content topic ideas with angles and target audience
tips: Provide business goals and target personas

aiProcess.toolRationale: Perplexity provides factual research with citations
tips: Search for statistics and data points

aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes fluent marketing copy quickly
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Complete first draft in brand voice
tips: Provide brand voice guidelines and examples
Include target word count and structure

aiProcess.description: Refine and edit with AI feedback
tips: Ask for specific feedback on clarity, engagement, and persuasion

aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT adapts content to different formats quickly
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Content adapted for social, email, ads, etc.
tips: Specify character limits and format requirements
Ask for multiple variations to test

aiProcess.toolRationale: Human review for accuracy and brand alignment

whyItMatters: Content is the engine of inbound marketing. Quality content drives organic traffic, builds brand authority, and nurtures leads through the funnel. AI dramatically increases content velocity while maintaining (or improving) quality.
commonMistakes: Using AI-generated content without editing - always add human touch
Ignoring brand voice - provide clear guidelines to AI
Generic topics - differentiate with unique angles and insights
No call to action - every piece of content should have a next step
tips: Create a 'brand voice document' to give AI consistent guidance
Use AI for first drafts, then add your expertise and examples
Generate 3-5 headline variations and test the best performer
Ask AI to 'make this more conversational' or 'add more proof points'
Build a prompt library for different content types
